question: 指差す
sourceMnemonic: When you want to use your <kanji>finger</kanji> to explain the <kanji>distinction</kanji> between more than one thing you need <vocabulary>to point at</vocabulary> it. Otherwise the person you're talking to won't be able to tell which one you're talking about.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The readings for this word are both kun'yomi readings. You've learned both of these readings by now so you should be able to read this on your own.
